long_description:
Overview

Located in the exclusive Bellapais area, this high-end development features only 12 bespoke Type A villas — each offering:

  • 4 en-suite bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and 252 m² of elegant living space
  • Sits on a generous 500 m² plot plus an additional 200 m² landscaped area

Unique Selling Points

  • Panoramic Sea & Mountain Views
  • Private Outdoor Oasis with cinema, BBQ, garden, pool
  • Smart Infrastructure with gated entry and garage

Interior Features

  • Premium finishes: 60x120 tiles, laminate bedrooms
  • Double-sided fireplace, LED lighting, smart wiring
  • Central VRF HVAC, underfloor heating, solar system

Energy & Utilities

  • Full insulation, 8m³ water tank, solar booster
  • Backup generator, EV-charging ready

Extras & Location

  • Optional basement (gym, cinema, cellar)
  • 2–5 min from Bellapais Abbey, Kyrenia Harbour
  • ~40 min Ercan / ~75 min Larnaca Airport

Overview

Villa Type B offers 212 m² of thoughtfully designed living space — a refined yet more compact version of Type A.

  • 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms on a 500 m² plot + 200 m² landscaping

Outdoor & Garden

  • Private pool, garden cinema, fireplace lounge
  • BBQ area with sink, ambient lighting, garage
  • Smart gate with license-plate recognition

Interior Highlights

  • Double-sided fireplace, 4 en-suite bedrooms
  • VRF air-conditioning, solar-ready infrastructure
  • Premium 60×120 tiles, laminate, LED lighting
  • Full smart wiring, pantry, laundry

Energy & Infrastructure

  • Roof/wall/floor insulation, water booster
  • 8 ton tank, solar collector with heat pump
  • Backup generator, EV charging ready

Location & Lifestyle

  • 2–3 min to Bellapais, 5 min Kyrenia Castle
  • 15–20 min to vineyards and golf
  • ~40 min Ercan / ~75 min Larnaca Airport
